Package spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.services

Class RoomService

java.lang.Object
spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.services.RoomService
@Service public class RoomService extends Object
Service class for managing rooms. This class is responsible for managing rooms, including retrieving all rooms, retrieving rooms by availability for a specific date range, retrieving a room by its ID or room number, saving rooms, and deleting rooms.
Author:
Team ABCFG

      Returns:
